duties_responsibilities.duty: Learn and develop standard preventative maintenance skills in line with company standards.
Shadow and support Technicians in diagnosing failures and making required repairs.
Develop a working knowledge of troubleshooting techniques for mechanical, electrical, and control system problems.
Gain familiarity with the FedEx Ground operation and troubleshooting techniques for equipment.
Utilize the CMMS to enter and retrieve activity log information and reports.
Adhere to safety standards, attend safety committees, and address safety concerns.
Work flexible schedules, including weekends and rotating shifts.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required, enrolled in an approved, accredited technical program or state approved college or technical school.
